titles.title: Supporting the establishment of a Presidential Youth Council.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 7/24/2012--Introduced. Calls on the President to establish a Presidential Youth Council to create recommendations that: (1) advise the President and the administration on the perspectives of young people, (2) make public policy-related youth programs more efficient and effective, and (3) address issues that will affect the long-term future of the United States. Recommends that: (1) Council members meet certain criteria, and (2) the Council as a whole undertake activities to solicit the unique views and perspectives of young people and bring them to the attention of the head of each federal department or agency and Congress.
